I'm single, but my friends are like my family.
my favorite band is the muggers.
i ve a big family.
I rewrote the birthday card I was going to send to my mom so it was perfect.
I've found that reading to my baby is a great way to bond with her and help her learn new things.

participant_2.background:
I saw an enormous whale while I was fishing with my uncle.
i enjoy being outside.
I enjoy strawberries because they are a sweet and juicy treat.
i work as a receptionist at a lawyers office.
I'd love to take my kids to the ballet in air conditioning.

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do outside?
I love to fish, and I saw an enormous whale while I was fishing with my uncle!
That is so cool! I've never seen a whale in person.
It was amazing! It was so big and majestic.
I can imagine! I'm not much of a fisher person, but I do like to go on walks and hikes.
I love going on walks too! I like to explore new places and get some fresh air.
Me too! I love being outside and taking in the sights and sounds of nature.
I also enjoy going to the park and reading. Do you like to read?
I love to read! I'm always looking for new books to read. I've been reading a lot of books about parenting lately.
Oh that's cool! I'm not a parent yet, but I'm sure it's a lot of work.
It is! But it's also really rewarding.
I can imagine! I'm sure it's great to watch your kids grow and learn.
It is! It's the best feeling in the world.
